products.title: Rimini, Azure - Roller Blind
products.description: The pale blue of the rimini in azure will make you see bright white clouds the more you look at it. It really is the colour of that blue sky we hope to wake up to every day, and with this in your room, you might just be able to fool yourself. Nestle amongst white walls and pale woods to really emulate that outdoors feel, or pair with sunny yellows to create a pretty, cheerful atmosphere. Perfect for waking up to in a bedroom or a subtly coloured nursery; or for a cool, clean look in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Rimini, Turquoise - Roller Blind
products.description: The bright aqua of the rimini in turquoise gives a cheery and contemporary look to a window. The smooth fabric is hardy enough to keep out the brighter sun rays, yet lightweight enough to allow a little light to still penetrate through. Pair with greens and browns for a fun, jungle theme, or with stark whites and pale, ice blues for a striking look and a cool, fresh atmosphere. This is perfect for a current, clean look in a bedroom or as part of an aquatic look in a bathroom.

products.title: Rimini, Powder Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Rimini's powder blue is a cool, icy hue that brings a clean, fresh vibe to any room it's used in. Offering privacy whilst still allowing plenty of light through, you'll have no concerns about shadows or darkness in your room when it's closed. Complement navy blues, aqua shades, and deep sapphires to create a neat, coordinated look in a bedroom or living room. It will also work beautifully with bright whites for a subtle, crisp style that's perfect for a modern kitchen or bathroom.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout)'s blue combines their ever popular blackout fabric, with its unique, fine texturing, with a timeless blue that is sure to add a simple splash of colour and a touch of fresh, contemporary style to any room. Use the rimini blue to match pretty florals in the bedroom for a fresh, country look, or stark whites in the kitchen for a contemporary style. It's also the perfect shade for a sea-themed bathroom or a fun, colourful playroom for the kids.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Bluebell - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in bluebell is a classic light blue that is sure to add a touch of elegance to any home. But it's certainly not style over substance, with the rimini fabric being a top quality blackout material that provides all you need when it comes to keeping out the glare of the sun. Combine the pretty bluebell colour with soft yellows and rich creams to create a vibrant yet not overpowering colour scheme.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Cobalt - Roller Blind
products.description: Mixing practicality with modern style, the rimini (blackout) in cobalt is a high quality blackout blind with an easy-to-use roller mechanism. Featuring a striking blue tone as a bold and vibrant feature, it is sure to add a burst of alluring colour and personality wherever it goes. Display the cobalt against a contrasting white and dove grey background for a contemporary palette in a teenager's bedroom.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Navy - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in navy is a traditional navy blue that will never go out of style. Made from the latest blackout fabric, this blind is best way control unwanted light from the outside changing the mood of your room or affecting your night's sleep. Offset the navy against a bright reds and ice whites for a fun, naval theme in a living room or bedroom. Or consider combining it with a lighter blues and purples for a beautifully stepped colour theme in a dining room or home office.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Teal - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) teal is a colour that means different things to different people, which is precisely why we believe it should be celebrated at every turn. When you want to be able to reimagine your space in a way that evokes memories, this is a shade that makes it happen. The cross between blues and greens that trinity (blackout) teal provides allows you to unify two of the most sought after areas of the colour spectrum.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Baby Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new baby blue fabric is already proving to be one of the most popular additions to the trinity blackout collection, and with good reason. It offers a subtle texture that sits gently in the background, adding something that will be appreciated no matter which room you choose to use it in. The wonderful thing about baby blue is that you can use it to set the tone for any number of different creative avenues.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Denim - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout in denim is so much more than a fabric that allows you to get the perfect restful sleep mind and body need. It's a contemporary shade whose texture really brings the colour to life, and allows you to do something a little bit special. We love the idea of hanging denim in the kitchen so that you can turn on the style when it's time to cook up a feast. If you have the option to match it to the tiling then even better, but don't feel like you have to constrain yourself when the time comes to make a change.

products.title: Roma, Aqua Haze - Roller Blind
products.description: The sweet duck egg of roma's aqua haze makes for a lovely accent to any window. The colour really comes into its own when set against the outside sunlight, and it provides privacy without blocking the light out altogether. For some country chic, pair with pretty floral curtains in your dining room or place against white walls and pine units in a kitchen to truly brighten things up. The pale colour also makes this the ideal blind for small utility rooms or bathrooms that don't get a lot of natural light.

products.title: Fortune, Teal - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma in fortune green is a subtle, blue-teal shade with a wonderfully oceanic look to it. Typical of roma fabric, the material is supple yet strong, making for a high quality blind that lasts. Opt for a lovely seaside theme in your bedroom by matching the fortune green to shabby chic accessories, bleached woods, and similar blues and greens. Go one step further and add seashells and coastal pictures too.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Dark Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Pair practicality with style with the roma (fr) in dark blue, where a flame-retardant fabric, ideal for commercial buildings, forms a substantial and contemporary blind with an easy pull-cord mechanism. This distinct blend of fibers creates a crease-free blind with a neat and modern look, and in a gorgeous midnight shade. Match the vibrant and bold dark blue with a complementing and current palette of dove greys, white, and charcoal to form a stylish and modern theme.

products.title: Tiffany, Gentle - Roller Blind
products.description: A clever combination of a light cream, gently curved patterning, set on a deeper cream fine fabric background, the tiffany gentle has a pleasing homely feel and will sit subtly amidst almost any colour scheme. The tiffany gentle is a very versatile blind, and is particularly suited to more traditional dcor styles. It can provide a wonderful lightening effect in living rooms or dining rooms where darker woods and furniture might take over, or can provide a touch of modern patterning to a neutral hallway or conservatory without dominating your existing style.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Bluebell - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) bluebell couldn't be closer in shade to that of the pretty wildflower itself. This pretty yet simple blind is made from durable, wipe-clean fabric, and has all of the features of its sister blackout blinds. Use in the kitchen amidst cream walls and delicate florals for a spring-like feel and all of the cheer that comes with it, or add it to lilacs and pinks in a child's room, using it to lift out the colours in coordinating patterns.

products.title: Tiffany, Flawless - Roller Blind
products.description: The tiffany flawless is an elegant and refined blind. A light, breezy fabric layered with a natural contoured pattern, the flawless looks simply stunning as it delicately shimmers in the light. Use the timeless off-white of the flawless to accentuate darker neutrals in a home office or dining room, or pair with pretty peaches and medium woods to add a touch of sophistication and class to an open kitchen diner.

products.title: Tiffany, Smoulder - Roller Blind
products.description: A blind offering a light and classy fabric, the tiffany smoulder is a modern take on the colour charcoal, with three gently contrasting tones and a beautiful pattern. The combination of natural-shaped patterning and the fine texture of the cloth allows this blind to flow effortlessly when lowered. The subtle variations in tone on this blind make the smoulder well-suited to both darker themed rooms, like traditional country cottage kitchens with dark wood features, and light and airy living rooms and dining rooms.

products.title: Tiffany, Chrome - Roller Blind
products.description: An on-trend portfolio of natural greys and a free-flowing pattern combine harmoniously to create tiffany chrome. The way in which the threads shimmer under the light gives it the name, and the way in which it refines any contemporary space gives it the reputation. Match with deep sandy browns and hints of natural green for a simple triple colour offering that instantly makes you feel at home. For an added touch of inspiration you could add some simple minimalist wall art to the home office so that you can get truly creative when the time comes.

products.title: Tiffany, Imagine - Roller Blind
products.description: Dare to imagine the ideal blend of natural beige, soothing creams, and a naturally flowing raised patterning, and you have the tiffany imagine, the calming influence you have been looking for. The imagine will work wonderfully amongst contrasting dark woods in a neutral living or sitting room, or in a luxurious bedroom full of browns, creams, and golds. Or place in a guest bedroom or hallway where the distinctive tiffany patterning can add a touch of neutral style with little effort.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Azure - Roller Blind
products.description: For an eye-catching window display, feature the vivid roma (fr) in azure. Made from sturdy, flame-retardant material, perfect for commercial use, this is a modern blind with a simple rolling mechanism for easy functionality. Blend the vibrant azure with bursts of lime green, dove grey, and duck egg blue to form a current palette of summer brights. Stick to a soothing white or ivory base for a clean and contemporary look, adding heaps of character and contrast by intertwining the selected tones with botanic prints and compelling textures.

products.title: Tiffany, Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: A clever and enchanting blend of different tones of cream, the tiffany dove is a light, classy blind whose patterning provides a distinctive and eye-catching feature for any window in your home. Place in the bedroom to provide a light and airy feel, and a natural colour against other dcor, or perhaps add to the bathroom, where the dove will offer balance and airiness when set against bolder colours that need toning down.

products.title: Delicia, Aquamarine - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at delicia aquamarine you will see the relaxed cream background contrasting with the vibrant electric blue petals. This allows you to see two different sides of the colour spectrum at the same time, and to understand that they can harmonise in unexpected ways. Embrace the vitality of the blue by matching it with a crisp apple green. This will enable you to breathe new life into any space, and to do it in a way that introduces plenty of natural colour and vitality.

products.title: Anthology, Denim - Roller Blind
products.description: If there's an iconic colour and texture that you need in your home then it has to be denim. We thought so for years, which is why we jumped at the chance to add anthology denim to their portfolio of roller blind fabrics. It's a creative mix of blue and white that enables you to go whichever way you want with your decor. The conservatory could be a great option because it combines light and a gentle breeze in a way no other room in the house does.

products.title: Blossom, Blue Oar - Roller Blind
products.description: We fell in love with blue oar the moment we saw it because of the nocturnal resonance of the blue. It reminds us of seeing natural colours set against the dark evening sky - a time when the greens and pinks actually become magnified as their colourful backdrop fades to black. If you want to bottle this feeling, adding blue oar to your bathroom would be an inspired choice. It can be hard to find space for pictures and artwork in one of the more specialist spaces in the home, which means floral blinds offer a unique opportunity.

products.title: Stripy (Blackout), Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Stripy blue is a great way of incorporating the full range of blues into your house, from sky blue, light blue, all the way to navy. The variation in width of the stripes gives this high quality blackout blind a fresh and modern look. Stripy blue works perfectly when you are looking to add to, or create, a blue-themed kitchen or living room, to show of the true range of tones. Alternatively, why not fit the stripy blue in the hallway or landing, to give an often overlooked area of the home a more upbeat look? Stripy (blackout), blue - roller blind stripy blue is a great way of incorporating the full range of blues into your house, from sky blue, light blue, all the way to navy.

products.title: Osborne, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: The osborne aqua is made from a high quality fabric, and gives a modern take on a classically ornate plant-life patterning. An off-white background covered in a faint, smoky blue, the aqua combines a classic pattern with the most up-to-date colour combinations and tones. The aqua works fantastically in living rooms or dining rooms to break up a more dominant colour scheme, and can also serve as a subtle infusion of colour and design to an area of the house that you would like to keep more neutral, such as the hallway or bathroom.

products.title: Florance, Teal - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at the deep calming blue of florence teal, you feel at peace and at ease as your eye works its way across the leaves and petals. The artistic black outlines give the fabric a definitive quality that allow you to lose yourself in the moment as you escape to the country. Matching teal to a lush grass green to provide a natural balance and harmony of colour that will breathe new life into any room in the house.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: Enoki aqua uses a beautiful sea green to take your senses on an aesthetic journey they will remember forever. It's the kind of experience that changes the way you think about decor, and it's one that is encapsulated by the way in which the surrounding pattern gently changes with the light. A washed out blue is a great addition if you're looking to add a natural colour contrast that will fill your space.

products.title: Neo, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: Neo's aqua comprises of a speckled turquoise background on which sits an intricate symmetrical patterning, providing contemporary style to any window. And you won't lose all the light when you close it, as this filter blind allows light to penetrate through into your room. Place the aqua in the family bathroom, amongst white tiles and accenting accessories, or use for a cool, relaxing feel in a light taupe bedroom, where you're looking for both function and style, without the fuss.

products.title: Ardwell, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: The ardwell in aqua is made from a quality fabric that is functional, lightweight, and adorned with beautifully printed curvaceous plant designs that enliven the senses. The crisp white contrasts stunningly with the weathered beige background, whilst the duck-egg blue is always a calming colour to have in any home. Perfect for complementing rooms with plain walls and floors, the aqua is certainly a work of art all its own.

products.title: Tranquil, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: The tranquil in aqua is comprised of delicate teal and soft brown florals and leaves, set on a pale taupe-cream backdrop that will provide just enough shade and plenty of privacy, whilst still allowing some of that all-important daylight to trickle in. For a calming influence in your home office, surround the aqua with soft creams and light woods, only accenting occasionally with gentle teals and creamy cappuccinos.

products.title: Rubber Duck (Blackout), Navy - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new rubber duck blackout navy fabric is the finishing touch your new bathroom has been waiting for. With a playful design that's guaranteed to make you smile, combined in perfect harmony with a healthy dose of contemporary chic style, it has everything you could ever want from your new roller blinds. Match rubber duck with a range of light blue painted walls, and a whole host of trinkets on the walls.
